string.text: Unfortunately now it is impossible to fall asleep. Normal sleep time: from 21:00 to 6:00
Rainproof, well insulated sleeping bag. Treated with a special composition that repels mutants.
A special set of tools and materials designed to repair weapons.

Once already used a set with tools. It is designed to repair weapons, but those parts that it contains are not enough for a full repair. It is used only for repairing weapons with the help of a donor weapon.
A special set of tools and materials designed to repair an armored suit.

Once already used a set with tools. It is intended for repair of armored suits, however those details that it contains are not enough for a full repair. It is used only for repairing armored suits using a donor armor.

The usual model of the mp-3 player is specially modified for Zone conditions, with support for downloading music via the stalker network. Works on the built-in particle of the "Battery" artifact. Widely popular with stalkers is not acquired, but when there is no guitar, it will come down.
A new track was uploaded in MP-3 player.
Play each track one by one
The item could not be repaired, \n because you do not have a matching donor.
The item could not be repaired, \n because it's not in the slot.
How to repair: Repair the weapons in the slot using weapons of the same type? Repair the weapon using only the repair kit?
How to repair: Repair the armor, using the same type of armor details? Use only the repair kit?
This repair kit can be repaired only with the help of weapons-donor parts, if you have one. What do you want to do?
This repair kit can be repaired only with the help of a donor armored suit, if you have one. What do you want to do?
It is not possible to install an explosive charge without an unactivated remote explosion or install more than one charge due to technical limitations.
It is not possible to detonate an installed charge without a battery.
Mineral water is a great way to remove radionuclides without harm to health, but stalkers usually drink vodka.

An explosive charge, an unactivated remote control unit is needed to install. At the time of installation, the remote control and charge are tuned to one frequency. It is not possible to install two charges using one bullet, it is also not recommended to install two charges simultaneously.
Remote explosion device - not activated. Use when installing an explosive charge.
Remote explosion device - activated. Already configured for an installed explosive device, just press the button to undermine. A battery is required for operation.
Special battery for remote explosion device.
